abstract: The decision by the European Central Bank and the Bank of England to leave interest rates unchanged highlights their differences with the Federal Reserve in the United States.
snippet: The decision by the European Central Bank and the Bank of England to leave interest rates unchanged highlights their differences with the Federal Reserve in the United States.
lead_paragraph: The European Central Bank and the Bank of England left their interest rates unchanged on Thursday, highlighting their differences with the Federal Reserve in the United States.

headline.main: E.C.B. and Britain Hold Rates Steady
